chatGUI

Class ChatGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • chatGUI.ChatGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, java.util.Observer, FromUser, ToUser

    public class ChatGUI
extends java.lang.Thread
implements FromUser, ToUser, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.Observer
    Class ChatGUI The "view" in the design pattern "MVC"
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuanbo Wang & Asma Soufi
